casebody.data:
GOVERNMENT OF THE VIRGIN ISLANDS, Plaintiff v. SAMUEL BRADSHAW, Defendant

Civil No. —

District Court of the Virgin Islands Div. of St. Croix May 14, 1968 GORDON, District Judge

The motion of defendant for leave to appeal from the Order of the Municipal Court of the Virgin Islands, JDR. 126/1966, is denied for the reason that the Municipal Court, in its Memorandum Opinion of February 8,1968, has properly and correctly disposed of the issues involved in the case.
